Óscar A. Montiel

Listening now to 🎲 by 🥁

Óscar A. Montiel, México

Software Developer by profession—human being as raison d'être from Querétaro, México.

I've worked for projects involving 3D, web, art, front-end and multimedia.

Fully interested in the study on how new (digital) technologies affects society.

For more info please download my C.V. or contact me via email here.

Arqueología Flickeriana (2021)

Explore Mexico's photos inside Flickr by date and state. Enter here. For more info here (in spanish). Selected for exhibition in Encuentro de imagen MMXXI: tierra y territorio, CECRITICC.

Jardines Virtual World (2020)

Immerse yourself inside a musical garden by music producer Jardines album Alquitrán. In collaboration with Studio Maremoto.MX. Lose yourself here.

Teaching

Have teached artistic programming for BEMA, Fantasma en la máquina and Voltaje Hacklab.

For more info please download my C.V. or contact me via email here.
